title: Supra and Google Partner to Bring Fast Price Feeds to Financial Markets
description: Miami, Florida, October 23rd, 2023, Chainwire Supra, a leading provider of secure, scalable oracles for decentralized applications (dApps), today announced a partnership with Google Cloud to bring fast and reliable price feeds to Web2 and Web3 financial markets.  The partnership will allow Supra to leverage Google Cloud’s infrastructure and expertise to provide dApps with access […]

title: Egypt Becomes First MENA Country to Issue Chinese Yuan-Denominated Bonds
description: Eygpt has reportedly become the first Middle East North Africa (MENA) region country to issue so-called “panda bonds” after it issued Chinese yuan denominated bonds worth $479 million. Issuing panda bonds marks another step in Egypt’s attempts to move away from costly dollar denominated loans. Egypt’s Worsening Debt Affordability Egypt, one of Africa’s heavily indebted […]
